description.ko: 투명도와 생물 발광에 초점을 맞춘 심해 생명체의 고요하고 에테르적인 표현입니다.
description.en: A calm and ethereal representation of life in the deep ocean, focusing on transparency and bioluminescent light.

prompt: A serene procession of translucent #40E0D0 jellyfish with crystalline bells drifting through a #000080 deep sea trench. Intricate #006994 caustic patterns projected onto the creatures' membranes, rising #48D1CC bubbles, and fluid dynamics simulations. 8k, Octane Render, raytraced caustics, volumetric underwater lighting. A peaceful dance of transparent life in the high-pressure abyss.
